meanings.definition: The state or quality of being clearly noticeable or significant.
meanings.sent1: The markedness of the bright red sign made it easy to spot from far away.
meanings.sent2: The markedness of her unique talent set her apart from the other performers.
meanings.sent3: The markedness of the giant banana peel on the sidewalk caused everyone to stop and stare.
meanings.sent4: The markedness of the full moon against the dark sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The markedness of the loud alarm woke up the entire neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The condition of being distinguished or emphasized in comparison to something else.
meanings.sent1: The markedness of the tallest tree in the forest made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent2: The markedness of her outfit made her the center of attention at the party.
meanings.sent3: The markedness of the tiny kitten next to the huge dog was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The markedness of the diamond in the rough was undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The markedness of the lone flower in the desert was a beautiful sight.
